name: Spring Boot Agents
description: A2A agents built with Java Spring Boot for enterprise-grade reliability, observability, and scalability.

agentNotes.a2a-java-sdk-spring: Comprehensive Java SDK with auto-configuration and Spring AI integration
agentNotes.a2ajava-spring: Pure Java A2A implementation with automatic MCP tool exposure
agentNotes.google-a2a: Multi-agent orchestration with Spring Boot, Ollama, and parent-child architecture
agentNotes.a2a4j: Complete Java implementation with server, client, examples, and starters
